item.title: Add LayerCI
item.description: https://layerci.com - CI for full stack projects. 1 full stack preview environment with 5GB memory & 3 CPUs .

item.title: Update 'Forms' section
item.description:
https://formspark.io/ - Form to Email service, free plan allows unlimited forms, 250 submissions per month, support by Customer assistance team.
https://getform.io/ - Form backend platform for designers and developers, 1 form, 50 submissions, Single file upload, 100MB file storage.
https://pageclip.co/ - Free plan allows one site, one form, 1,000 submissions per month.
https://smartforms.dev/ - Powerful and easy form backend for your website, forever free plan allows 50 submissions per month, 250MB file storage, Zapier integration, CSV/JSON export, custom redirect, custom response page, Telegram & Slack bot, single email notifications.
https://www.zoho.com/forms/ - - with 40+ field types, customizable themes, situation-specific templates, and a simple user interface, helps you create beautiful, functional forms for all your needs. Free plan allows 3 forms, 500 submissions/month, 200 MB File storage.

item.title: Add Sider
item.description: https://sider.review - Code review platform for many languages. Supports integration with GitHub. Free for public repositories with unlimited users.

item.title: Update README.md
item.description: https://apitemplate.io - Auto-generate images and PDF documents with a simple API or automation tools like Zapier & Airtable. No CSS/HTML required. Free plan comes with 50 images/month and 3 templates.

item.title: Added CatchJS
item.description: https://catchjs.com/ - JavaScript error tracking with screenshots and click trails. Free for open source projects.

item.title: Add Webshrinker
item.description: https://webshrinker.com - Web Shrinker provides web site screenshot and domain intelligence API services. Free 100 requests/month.

item.title: Added APITemplate.io
item.description: https://apitemplate.io - Auto-generate social images and PDF documents with a simple API or automation tools like Zapier & Airtable. No CSS/HTML required.

item.title: Added Penpot
item.description: https://penpot.app - Web based, open source design and prototyping tool. Supports SVG. Completely free.

item.title: Added links in GitLab sub-points
item.description:
https://about.gitlab.com/product/continuous-integration) (Free for Public Repos, 400 mins/month for private repos - for Public Repos, 400 mins/month for private repos)
https://about.gitlab.com/product/pages - with [GitLab Pages](https://about.gitlab.com/product/pages).

item.title: Added AppFlux
item.description: https://appflux.io - Project Management tool with Log Management & Issues. Take your team onboard & forget management through emails.

item.title: Optimise GitHub & GitLab entries
item.description:
https://github.com/) — Unlimited public repositories and unlimited private repositories (with unlimited collaborators). Apart from this some other free services(there are much more but we list the main ones here - Unlimited public repositories and unlimited private repositories (with unlimited collaborators). Apart from this some other free services(there are much more but we list the main ones here) provided are :
https://github.com/features/actions)(Free for Public Repos, 2000 min/month for private repos free - Public Repos, 2000 min/month for private repos free)
https://pages.github.com) (Free for Public Repos - Hosting](https://pages.github.com) (Free for Public Repos)
https://github.com/features/packages) (Free for public repos,500 MB storage & 1GB bandwidth outside CI/CD free for private repos - & Container Registry](https://github.com/features/packages) (Free for public repos,500 MB storage & 1GB bandwidth outside CI/CD free for private repos)
https://about.gitlab.com/ - Unlimited public and private Git repos with unlimited collaborators. Also offers the following features :
